name: CHOOSEN.TV
overview:
Choosen.tv works to make it easy to find and watch video that really interests you. No matter where that video is hosted or what platform or player you choose to watch it on. Choosen.tv is your universal source to the video web: Browse, watch, collect, share great videos, tv shows, and movies from across the web. Personalize your web tv and video experience.

# Enjoy thousands videos and shows from across the web. # Start a video playlist and invite friends to add items too. # Join or create channels of your favorite topic. # Stay up-to-date on your favorite tv shows and series. # Embed your personal playlist on any web page. # Recommend videos and shows to your friends. # Watch video on your tv through Wii, PS3, TiVo etc.. # Add your playlists or channel to iTunes, miro or iPod
